GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Custom Name Format - Update Name Format Funtion Info
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Updates the name format function information.
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Custom Name Format - Update Name Format Funtion Info
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_UPDATENAMEFORMATFUNTIONINFO ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output ) as set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try update dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION set DISPLAY='Custom Name Format - Household Addressee Informal', EXAMPLE='(Custom HAI) - Maggie and William Smith, Jr.', ISJOINTFUNCTION='0', DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID where FORMATSQLFUNCTION='USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_ADDRESSEE_FORMAL'
update dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION set DISPLAY='Custom Name Format - Household Salutation Informal', EXAMPLE='(Custom HSI) - Maggie and William', ISJOINTFUNCTION='0', DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID where FORMATSQLFUNCTION='USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_SALUTATION_INFORMAL'
update dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION set DISPLAY='Custom Name Format - Household Salutation Formal', EXAMPLE='(Custom HSF) - Mr. and Mrs. Smith', ISJOINTFUNCTION='0', DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID where FORMATSQLFUNCTION='USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_SALUTATION_FORMAL'
update dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION set DISPLAY='Custom Name Format - Household Addressee Formal', EXAMPLE='(Custom HAF) - Mr. and Mrs. William H. Smith, Jr.', ISJOINTFUNCTION='0', DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID where FORMATSQLFUNCTION='USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_ADDRESSEE_FORMAL'
update dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION set DISPLAY='Custom Name Format - Individual Saluation Informal', EXAMPLE='(Custom ISI) - William', ISJOINTFUNCTION='0', DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID where FORMATSQLFUNCTION='USR_UFN_INDIVIDUAL_SALUTATION_INFORMAL'
update dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION set DISPLAY='Custom Name Format - Individual Addressee Formal', EXAMPLE='(Custom IAF) - Mr. William H. Smith, Jr.', ISJOINTFUNCTION='0', DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID where FORMATSQLFUNCTION='USR_UFN_INDIVIDUAL_ADDRESSEE_FORMAL'
update dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION set DISPLAY='Custom Name Format - Individual Addressee Informal', EXAMPLE='(Custom IAI) - William Smith, Jr.', ISJOINTFUNCTION='0', DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID where FORMATSQLFUNCTION='USR_UFN_INDIVIDUAL_ADDRESSEE_INFORMAL'
update dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION set DISPLAY='Custom Name Format - Individual Salutation Formal', EXAMPLE='(Custom ISF) - Mr. Smith', ISJOINTFUNCTION='0', DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID where FORMATSQLFUNCTION='USR_UFN_INDIVIDUAL_SALUTATION_FORMAL'
SET @NUMBEREDITED = 8; return 0;
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
